      Returns:

    • saveAccount

      @PostMapping("/save") public String saveAccount(@ModelAttribute("account") Account account, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Save account string.
      Parameters:
      account - gets from the model of registration template
      model - the model
      Returns:
      save user in db. In case of blank email or password will trigger the registration interceptor

    • login

      @PostMapping("/signIn") public String login(@ModelAttribute("account") Account account, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Login string.
      Parameters:
      account - gets from the model of log in template
      model - the model
      Returns:
      in case of successful sign in will return either seller or buyer template, dependence on role
